instruction: Make a list of things to do when feeling down.
output:
- Talk to a friend or family member.
- Do some physical activity or exercise.
- Listen to your favorite music.
- Take a hot bath or shower.
- Take a walk in nature.
- Read a book.
- Write down your thoughts and emotions.
- Make a list of things you are grateful for.
- Get enough sleep.
- Meditate or do some yoga.
- Play a game with friends.
- Watch a funny movie or show.
- Eat a healthy and balanced meal.
- Start a fun project.
- Paint or draw.
- Make a scrapbook.
- Take a nap.
- Spend time with a pet.
- Drink some tea.
- Talk to a therapist or counselor.
